Name: Tri-Star
About the game: Tri-Star is a an endless horizontal-scrolling space shooter featuring Roguelike and Roguelite elements. Blast your way through waves of tricky enemies to face off against arduous boss battles. Form a squadron of three unique ships from an expanding roster and kit them out with upgrades as you engage in a battle for survival. Defeat bosses and achieve high scores to unlock a large pool of new enhancements, game modes and ships to try on your next playthrough. Squadrons: Select three ships and manage their loadout as you attempt to get as far as you can. Leave damaged ships at base to be repaired while you continue the fight 12 Playable Ships: Each with its own primary and special weapons Custom Loadout: Use the scrap of your fallen enemies to enhance 6 different stats and attach over 60 varied upgrades Endless Replayability: Play again and again through mostly randomly generated levels Score Attack: Short on time? Go solo with no repairs or upgrades and amass as high of a score as you can Ace Mode: Prove you have what it takes to take on fiercer enemies who will show no mercy
